ingredients.item: 1 tbsp Love Life Pumpkin Seeds, toasted
250g pack Cypriot light halloumi, sliced into 6

instructions.step: Pour 150ml boiling water over the couscous
in a bowl, cover and leave for 5 minutes. Then fluff up with a fork and stir in the pistachios, pomegranate seeds, cherry tomatoes and pumpkin seeds.
Whisk together the olive oil and harissa, and stir into the couscous.
Meanwhile, brush the halloumi with a little oil and griddle or grill for 1-2 minutes each side. Serve on top of the jewelled couscous.
